name: Kings of the Ring (Pico 8 Edition)
description:
Kings of the Ring is a quick and simple tactical game for 2 players. Using a deck of standard cards to make move and attack their wrestler, players must eliminate their opponent to become the KING OF THE RING !

CONTROLS

Use arrow keys to move and X/C to cancel/validate an action.

HOW TO PLAY

Each turn, discard or play as many cards as you want to move on the board or attack your opponent.

Each card allow a specific action :

  • Clover - move orthogonally
  • Spade - move diagonally
  • Diamond - attack orthogonally
  • Heart - attack diagonally

There is a special tile in the arena allowing you to inflict  twice damage if you stand on it when attacking !

End turn to draw up to 2 cards as long as you haven't already 5 cards in hand.

Note : this is a fully playable version but It needs a few tweaks and I plan to add additional features to improve the strategy.

ATTENTION : if you play a card in a direction not highlighted on the board, the card will be played and the action won't be executed ! (I'll correct this soon)

Made during the Gamecodeur Game Jam 26

Kings of the Ring is based on the boardgame "Les Rois du Ring" by Chien Sauvage
